welcomeMessage:
Welcome to Hari's Portfolio Terminal v1.0
Type 'help' to see available commands.

help.response:
Available commands:
  help       - Show this help message
  about      - Navigate to About section
  education  - Navigate to Education section
  skills     - Navigate to Skills section
  updates    - Navigate to Updates section
  contact    - Navigate to Contact section
  theme      - Show available themes
  whoami     - Display current user info
  date       - Show current date and time
  clear      - Clear terminal screen
  matrix     - Enter the Matrix...
  hack       - Initiate hacking sequence
  coffee     - Get some coffee
  sudo       - Try sudo commands

theme.response:
Available themes:
  Use 'theme <name>' to change theme
  - light
  - dark
  - blue
  - purple

whoami.response:
You are: Anonymous Visitor
IP: 127.0.0.1 (localhost)
Browser: Awesome Browser
Status: Exploring Hari's Portfolio

matrix.response:
Wake up, Neo...
The Matrix has you...
Follow the white rabbit.

Knock, knock, Neo.
